question:
These days some people spend a lot of money on tickets to go to sporting or cultural events.
Do you think this is a positive or negative development?
text: Cut-and-dried, time is changing unceasingly and so are the leisure activities done by various group of people and also their taste according to our developing world over and over. Whether lavishing an unmeasurable amount of money to do hubbies has numerous benefits or not is a fiercely debated topic that divides people. However, it is prohibited by some individuals believed that squandering a great finance on sporty and traditional events may bring miscellaneous negative consequences, in following paragraph it will be explicated contrary standpoint. A part from its entertaining outlook to set free temporarily from hectic and repetitive daily life, sponsoring such events also brings about financially benefits and then booms economic.

First and foremost, taking part in such breathtakingly light-hearted events, regardless its ridiculously expensive entrance commission, makes a self-evident enjoyable opportunity for whom have been overwhelmed under highly engaged with non-stop technological and competitive responsibilities. A high level staff in a gigantic company like Apple and suffering from physical pains caused by sedentary hardship routines can be counted as a vivid instance. Doing so, overlooking astonishing cultural ceremonies or sport event to release her/his thrill, wreaks a havoc on her/his mental or physical situation and results depression, back pain, arthroses and so on by aging. By taking this illustration into account, therefore, not only do these sorts of spending encompass skeptical superiority, but they can also hinder peoples’ health to turn out detrimental.

Moreover, having mentioned immensely beneficial for healthiness and imperative role in population lifestyle, these trendy occurrences are sponsored by pronounced lucrative manufactures and companies eventuated a massive competitions among them. Never can it be ignored that sponsorship is capable of arising a myriad financial profits in a race which held by two well-known soccer teams namely Perspolis and Esteghlal, two popular ones in Iran, for example. By expressed case, it is obviously clear that attending in convention and sport events can be as a catalyzer for every nation’s economic and boost their national income.

To conclude, after a careful scrutinizing of misspending a pronounced amount of fortune in order that purchase pastime activities entry pass and its outcome respecting amusing the general public and surging fund for sports and communities, it seems noticeably advantageous.
